headline.main: NATO to Confer With Russia on Closer Ties

lead_paragraph: NATO's secretary general, Lord Robertson, will arrive here on Thursday in an effort to strengthen Russia's relationship with the alliance. President Vladimir V. Putin's offer of help in the war against terrorism after the Sept. 11 attacks against the United States has improved the chances for cooperation.
abstract: NATO sec gen Lord Robertson to visit Moscow for talks on strengthening Russian ties to alliance, especially in light of Pres Vladimir Putin's offer of help in war against terrorism (S)
snippet: NATO's secretary general, Lord Robertson, will arrive here on Thursday in an effort to strengthen Russia's relationship with the alliance.    President Vladimir V. Putin's offer of help in the war against terrorism after the Sept. 11 attacks again...
